channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Harbin Institute of Technology on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Divide-and-Conquer Meets Consensus: Unleashing the Power of Functions in Code Generation
item.description: FUNCODER: a novel code generation framework that uses a divide-and-conquer approach with functional consensus to generate code that meets complex requirements.

item.title: Ensemble Learning for Heterogeneous Large Language Models with Deep Parallel Collaboration
item.description: DEEPEN: a training-free LLM ensemble framework fusing probability distributions in a relative space to overcome vocabulary misalignment, improving performance consistently across benchmarks.
